author: Nandan Thaker
text: Anything but Lewandowski winning it when he totally deserves to😂🤦🏻‍♂️ https://t.co/zxd8pY7JyX

author: Nandan Thaker
text: No wonder Barcelona are in a bad shape. https://t.co/sUPdof4G1Z

author: Nandan Thaker
text: Not to spark any conflict regarding Roberto Carlos and his amazing performances throughout his career, but LUKE SHAW IS SO FAR CREATING A SIMULTANEOUS HISTORY ALONG HIS FIGHTS WITH THAT BIG INJURY HE CAME OVER AS WELL AS THE CRITICISM THAT HE HAS FACED! #LukeShaw The BEST LB rn. https://t.co/835JaKeiNQ

author: Nandan Thaker
text: The £220m duo did it over the @PepTeam with his not so best tactical strat for the team selection tonight! @ChelseaFC defence totally had Kdb and the amazing @PhilFoden under control while the flanks were so well covered by @reecejames_24 and @BenChilwell ! https://t.co/2Si4Cq6rJD

author: Nandan Thaker
text: Also a noteworthy signing and a superb performance throughout the season with maybe the most clean sheets in a single @ChampionsLeague season! https://t.co/fDUJYdnT4c

author: Nandan Thaker
text: #Kante of course was the best player on the field tonight! Totally deserved the Man of the Match award and maybe a #ballondor nominee at the very least! Humble yet a beast on the field and a complete winner as he now wins it all!

author: Nandan Thaker
text: ..supporting Werner. Even after losing @tsilva3 very early into the game and rather not so fit @CesarAzpi after the second half, @ChelseaFC could take over the midfield area and dominate over until @PepTeam finally got @fernandinho subbed on!

author: Nandan Thaker
text: A much much much tactically better @ChelseaFC beats @ManCity in the @ChampionsLeague Finals! Kudos to Frank Lampard and of course Thomas Tuchel for rebuilding the squad and nourishing it well enough to bring it rather close to their very best lineups back around 2007!

author: Nandan Thaker
text: Don’t mean to rate Bruno above Lampard for just a year or for all what Lampard has achieved with both Chelsea and England, but the point is this proves Bruno’s skillset and the bitter truth that he’s been the best midfield player this season! #brunofernandes #MUFC https://t.co/mZWfelZjBM

author: Nandan Thaker
text: Never would have even had a nightmare as such! Kudos to the doctors and the influencers who are really trying their best to work it all out in this very messed situation. #CovidIndia #COVIDSecondWave #DigitalIndia https://t.co/O9IWgfVcqr

author: Nandan Thaker
text: Also, hoping for a better time to come sooner and wishing the best for everyone around. Take care, stay home. (Not that many people follow me on twitter and not sure if they ever will, but it goes out the same for every other human on the globe). #StayHomeStaySafe #COVID19India

author: Nandan Thaker
text: Might not be a good time to share something as such while still battling the global pandemic and the Super League scenario, but why not let anyone connected to football have a smile on their faces, even ManU fans like it made me. #SuperLeagueOut #COVIDSecondWaveInIndia https://t.co/KxX5l4GfDF

author: Nandan Thaker
text: #LIVMCI @VakilLay Not so happy to see the visitors add more to their tally but would absolutely love to have you on the sinking ship too xD Also, The Fortress is.... https://t.co/cTPDlBXlO5
